title: Trojan detected on win32 versions
body:
by **wcardozo**: 
Guys,

The MSI installer and the ZIP is being blocked by my antivirus ( Kaspersky ).
Trojans are being detected on godoc.exe and yacc.exe: Backdoor.Win32.Agent.chky and
Backdoor.Win32.Agent.chhf

Is this a false positive ?

The checksum of the files match with the reported value on the download page.
